import {useState, useRef} from 'react' import Todos from './Todos' export default function App() { const [todos, setTodos] = useState([ {header: 123, task: 321}]) const name = useRef(null) const task = useRef(null) return ( <>
name.current = e.currentTarget.value} maxLength="25" type="text" class="input__inputs__name" placeholder="Название" />
); }
